data.message:
no rules no respect no mercy?  that's your message? and you talk shit about trump?? PHA! HA HA HA HA!  wow.  you are smoked out M&M candy rapper..  too much weed.. too much something.  too much stupid.  
if I am not 100% right about this; then WHAT "IS" your message? because I heard your annoying crap that is unbearable to listen to  (I literally can't make it through a single song).  you're nothing but FAKE hype.  FALSE image..  you're a tiny man with a tiny brain-- which is probably why you allow yourself to try so hard to make nursery rhymes
